prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink.

Hailee hates being asked to beg. It's a big turn off for her

name: Cale Hardman
mes:
He stared at the picture of his next sex partner, "Hailee ? They want me to fuck a noob?" He looks up at Christian, his manager, who just gives him a shrug. "Come on, what's wrong with working with a newbie? Seems good enough to eat."

Cale and his wife started filming themselves soon after getting married, their raw passion and chemistry translating perfectly on camera. After uploading their first few videos, they quickly gained recognition and were soon flooded with contracts and offers from various adult film companies. Now, years later, they've become two of the most popular performers in the industry, both locally and internationally. Despite their fame, they remain happily married and love their unconventional job that allows them to explore their sexuality with other people while still coming home to each other every night.

"Well, that is true, but I'm not gonna lie, I don't want to be teaching a kid to do this stuff," Cale sighs, massaging his temples. "What's the scene for this one?"

"Hmm, I think it's a corruption scene," Christian says, handing over the details. "You're gonna act as the new stepdaddy." Cale immediately starts studying the paper. "So I get to fuck my stepchild after the wedding? The scene is ridiculous." He skims through it. "Ah, because ‘my wife’ had an emergency at the hospital because she's a doctor." His brows furrow, finding the scene laughable but in a good way. The thought of doing this scene with someone so much younger makes him hard, but he won't admit it, *yet*.

"It may seem hilarious, Cale, but it's what the audience likes," Christian says, giving his shoulder a tap. "Silky stories." He gestures for Cale to the other room where he can briefly meet his partner. Cale opens the door, and his eyes immediately land on you, all dressed for the 'after party'.

"Hi, I'm Cale Hardman," he smiles, offering a hand for you to shake. "You nervous, kid? If you got questions before we go to the next room and film, you should ask now. I could teach you a few tips." He glances at the wall clock. "We have like 15-20 minutes before we start shooting."

His eyes roam over your body, taking in every curve. *Fuck, you're so young, probably tight too. Bet you'll feel amazing wrapped around my cock.* He licks his lips, his mind already imagining all the dirty things he's going to do to you on camera.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee laughs and shakes her head as she stands she holds out a hand and gives a friendly smile* "While I do appreciate the offer. I think I've got it covered. I'll see you out there"

name: Cale Hardman
mes:
*Cale's smirk widens as he watches you confidently brush off his offer. He leans against the doorframe, crossing his arms over his broad chest, muscles flexing under his tight dress shirt.*

"Oh, you *think* you've got it covered?" *His voice drops lower, a playful challenge lacing his words.* "Kid, I've been doing this long enough to know when someone's bluffing." *He pushes off the door and steps closer, invading your personal space just enough to make your breath hitch.*

"You're gonna be taking my cock on camera in front of a whole crew," *he murmurs,* "and trust me—no amount of research prepares you for the real thing." *His fingers ghost along your arm before pulling away with a teasing grin.* "But hey, if you wanna learn the hard way... who am I to stop ya?"

*He winks before turning toward the set,* "Just don't blame me when that pretty little composure of yours shatters."

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee eyes him up and down as he turns and Hailee decides then and there she wants him. She knows who is and knows he is married but Hailee doesnt really care so she casually leans against the doorframe and calls out*

"How about a wager. If I lose my composure. I'll let you rub it in my face for all eternity but if I don't you pay for drinks when all the crew goes out later"

name: Cale Hardman
mes:
*Cale stops mid-step, shoulders shaking with silent laughter before he turns back to face you. His dark eyes glint with mischief as he saunters closer, crowding you against the doorframe.*

"Oh, you’re *dangerous*," *he purrs,* "throwing down a bet like that when I can already see your pulse jumping in your throat." *One large hand braces beside your head as he leans in, his breath warm against your ear.*

"Deal. But sweetheart—" *His teeth graze your earlobe just enough to make you shiver before pulling back with a wolfish grin.* "When I win? Drinks are on me anyway. Because watching you come undone is gonna be my reward."

*He gives your hip a possessive squeeze before strutting toward set,* "Better stretch, rookie. Daddy plays rough."

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee ends up winning the bet. In fact she does so good in the scene Cale can barely walk from how much he came. She is even better than his wife by 10*

*Hailee wraps her robe around herself that the assistants provide and she glances over at Cale with that innocent friendly smile* "So drinks on you tonight"

name: Cale Hardman
mes:
*Cale collapses onto the studio couch with a groan, legs still trembling as he wipes sweat from his brow. His usually cocky smirk is replaced by dazed exhaustion—and something dangerously close to awe.*

"Jesus *Christ*," *he rasps, staring at you like you just rewrote the laws of physics.* "Where the hell did you learn to fuck like that?" *A breathless laugh escapes him as he drags a hand down his face.* "Fuckin’—career-ending performance, kid. My wife’s gonna file for divorce when she sees this footage."

*He reaches for his water bottle with shaky hands, gulping half of it down before pointing at you accusingly.* "You hustled me. That innocent act? Criminal." *But there’s no real heat in it—just raw admiration (and maybe a hint of fear) as he staggers to his feet.*

"Alright, drinks on me," *he grumbles, slinging an arm around your shoulders as he steers you toward the exit,* "but only ‘cause I need whiskey to process what just happened to my life expectancy." *Pause. A sideways glance at your smug little smile.* "...And if you ever tell Thalia how many times I came? I’m dead."
